item.title: Implementing search functionality
item.description: Let’s say we have an online bookstore where we list all our available books. We want to be able to implement a search bar that can filter out results that match the title, author, publisher, etc. Solutions like Algolia, Solr, or Elasticsearch are non-trivial solutions that require quite a bit of configuration and resources. These solutions may also be overkill if you have a small to moderately large dataset. We can look at Fuse.
